verses.text: \w The|strong="H8432"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*: Their inheritance lay within the territory of Judah
and included Beersheba (or Sheba), Moladah,
Hazar-shual, Balah, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,
Ziklag, Beth-marcaboth, Hazar-susah,
Beth-lebaoth, and Sharuhen—thirteen cities, along with their villages.
Ain, Rimmon, Ether, and Ashan—four cities, along with their villages,

and all the villages surrounding these cities as far as Baalath-beer (Ramah of the Negev). \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Simeonites \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w territory|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w share|strong="H2506"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*’s \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w too|strong="H1961"\w* \w large|strong="H7227"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Simeonites \w received|strong="H5157"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*’s \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*. Zebulun’s Inheritance

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*: The border of their inheritance stretched as far as Sarid.
It went up westward to Maralah, reached Dabbesheth, and met the brook east of Jokneam.
From Sarid it turned eastward along the border of Chisloth-tabor and went on to Daberath and up to Japhia.
From there it crossed eastward to Gath-hepher and to Eth-kazin; it extended to Rimmon and curved around toward Neah.
Then the border circled around the north side of Neah to Hannathon and ended at the Valley of Iphtah-el.
It also included Kattath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah, and Bethlehem. There were twelve cities, along with their villages.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w including|strong="H2063"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. Issachar’s Inheritance

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*:
Their territory included Jezreel, Chesulloth, Shunem,
Hapharaim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kishion, Ebez,
Remeth, En-gannim, En-haddah, and Beth-pazzez.
The border reached Tabor, Shahazumah, and Beth-shemesh, and ended at the Jordan. There were sixteen cities, along with their villages.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w including|strong="H2063"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. Asher’s Inheritance

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asher:
Their territory included Helkath, Hali, Beten, Achshaph,
Allammelech, Amad, and Mishal. On the west the border touched Carmel and Shihor-libnath,
then turned eastward toward Beth-dagon, touched Zebulun and the Valley of Iphtah-el, and went north to Beth-emek and Neiel, passing Cabul on the left.
It went on to Ebron,\f + \fr 19:28 \ft Some Hebrew manuscripts Abdon; see Joshua 21:30.\f* Rehob, Hammon, and Kanah, as far as Greater Sidon.

The border then turned back toward Ramah as far as the fortified city of Tyre, turned toward Hosah, and came out at the Sea \f + \fr 19:29 \ft That is, the Mediterranean Sea, also called the Great Sea\f* in the region of Achzib,
Ummah, Aphek, and Rehob. There were twenty-two cities, along with their villages.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asher, \w including|strong="H2063"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. Naphtali’s Inheritance

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*:
Their border started at Heleph and the great tree of Zaanannim, passing Adami-nekeb and Jabneel as far as Lakkum and ending at the Jordan.

Then the border turned westward to Aznoth-tabor and ran from there to Hukkok, touching Zebulun on the south side, Asher on the west, and Judah at the Jordan \f + \fr 19:34 \ft Hebrew; LXX west, and the Jordan\f* on the east.
The fortified cities were Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Chinnereth,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edrei, En-hazor,
Iron, Migdal-el, Horem, Beth-anath, and Beth-shemesh. There were nineteen cities, along with their villages.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w including|strong="H2063"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. Dan’s Inheritance

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*:
The territory of their inheritance included Zorah, Eshtaol, Ir-shemesh,
Shaalabbin, Aijalon, Ithlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Bene-berak, Gath-rimmon,
Me-jarkon, and Rakkon, including the territory across from Joppa.

(Later, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Danites|strong="H1835"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* lost \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w Leshem|strong="H3959"\w*, \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Leshem|strong="H3959"\w*, \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w renamed|strong="H8034"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w after|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.)

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w including|strong="H2063"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1835"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. Joshua’s Inheritance

\w When|strong="H3615"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* distributing \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w territories|strong="H1367"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6310"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Timnath-serah|strong="H8556"\w* \f + \fr 19:50 \ft Timnath-serah is also known as Timnath-heres; see Judges 2:9.\f* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Ephraim, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w requested|strong="H7592"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w These|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inheritances|strong="H5159"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w* \w distributed|strong="H2505"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*. \w So|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w dividing|strong="H2505"\w* \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w*.
